title: Barcelona Wear Guide
summary: Explore Barcelona with all the information you need at your wrist!
description: Leave your paper guidebook behind. You will never miss another important tourist sight thanks to proximity based notifications. A carefully designed interface for Android Wear guarantees you seamless and intuitive usage experience. This app will help you to make the best of your stay in Barcelona, showing attractions with location nearest to your GPS position on the built-in map.Main features:- built-in map,- never, miss an interesting sight, proximity based notification when you get close to a tourist sight (optional)- integrated 3 days weather forecast- integrated currency exchange rate for today- 35 rated tourist sites, divided into neighborhoodsAnd all that just on your wrist!
descriptionHTML:
Leave your paper guidebook behind. You will never miss another important tourist sight thanks to proximity based notifications. A carefully designed interface for Android Wear guarantees you seamless and intuitive usage experience. This app will help you to make the best of your stay in Barcelona, showing attractions with location nearest to your GPS position on the built-in map.

Main features:
- built-in map,
- never, miss an interesting sight, proximity based notification when you get close to a tourist sight (optional)
- integrated 3 days weather forecast
- integrated currency exchange rate for today
- 35 rated tourist sites, divided into neighborhoods

And all that just on your wrist!
